product_information.text_save_password: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
product_information.text_master_password: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
product_information.text_first_place: First of all, you need to create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
product_information.text_what_data_save: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.
product_information.data_protection_policy: I am of legal age and I accept the processing of data according to the data protection policy.

form.first_step: First of all, you need to create a different password for your electronic belongings.
form.first_step_secound: You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
form.password_short: Password is too short; should be 8 characters minimum.
form.password_max: Password is too long; should be 24 characters max.
form.password_num_upper: Password must have one uppercase and one number
form.secound_step: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
form.create_track: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
form.track_max: The hint can only have a maximum of 60 characters
